articles.title: DPRK Government Cultural Delegation Leaves for Indonesia
articles.content:
DPRK Government Cultural Delegation Leaves for Indonesia
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government cultural delegation headed by Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, left here Tuesday to visit Indonesia.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Denounces S. Korea for Fabricating Spying Case
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Denounces S. Korea for Fabricating Spying Case
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Seoul District Police Agency on Nov. 9 announced misinformation that a former leading member of the Committee for National Reunification of the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils conducted espionage acts at various directives from the north, calling to task the fact that he had legitimately participated in the reunification functions and working contacts of youth and students from the north and the south from 2003.
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in its information bulletin No. 967 on Tuesday denounced it as an unpardonable anti-reunification and treacherous crime intended to foster the fascist terror-ridden situation under the pretext of security in south Korea in a bid to calm down the ever-mounting desire of the people of different circles for reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south and independent reunification and escalate confrontation between compatriots.
					
					 The information bulletin says:
					
					 The anti-reunification ultra-right conservatives of south Korea are now distorting the past discussions and contacts for reunification between the youth and students from the north and the south as a "lever for receiving directives" from someone and making a false report that "all kinds of data related to the student movement were delivered to the north." This goes to prove again that they are persistently seeking to obliterate the reunification movement of youth and students in south Korea.
					
					 It is also little different from an open declaration that in order to attain its ulterior political aims the puppet group will brand as spies all of those who visited the north and met compatriots there in the past years and incriminate their activities as "illegal" and "enemy-benefiting" to make them target of fascist suppression.
					
					 Worse still, such conspiratorial farce called the spying case was orchestrated again some days before an international meeting in south Korea. This more clearly revealed that the south Korean ruling conservative forces have no willingness to have dialogue and improve the relations between the north and the south but intend to stir up the international anti-DPRK opinion and confront with the DPRK to the last.
					
					 Neither national reconciliation and unity nor democratization of society and the independent reunification of the country can be expected unless the anti-DPRK smear campaign is decisively checked and the fascist repressive moves terminated immediately in south Korea.

articles.title: Huge Cone Type Crusher Goes Operational at Mining Complex
articles.content:
Huge Cone Type Crusher Goes Operational at Mining Complex
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- A new huge cone type crushing plant was built at the Musan Mining Complex in the DPRK. And a project for technologically updating Ore Dressing Plant No. 2 made successful progress there. 
					 This led to quadrupling the earth removing capacity while remarkably shortening the distance of heavy-duty trucks' running. It also made it possible to increase the production of quality concentrated ores and laid another solid foundation for the nation's metal industry.  
					
					 A ceremony for the completion of the plant was held on Tuesday. 
					
					 Present there were Ri Thae Nam, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Thae Bong, minister of Metal Industry, O Su Yong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and others.

articles.title: DPRK Proves Successful at 16th Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Proves Successful at 16th Asian Games
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifter Kim Kum Sok won a gold medal in the men's weightlifting event of the 16th Asian Games.
					 He won the men's 69kg gold with the lift of a total of 324kg on Monday.
					
					 Meanwhile, other DPRK players bagged 4 silver and 9 bronze medals in the events held till Monday.
					
					 Kim Un Guk and Cha Kum Chol grabbed silver medals in the men's 62kg and 56kg weightlifting, Pak Hyon Suk in the women's 58kg weightlifting and Sol Kyong in the women's 70kg judo respectively.
					
					 DPRK players came third in table tennis team (men and women) and the women's 10m running target events. 
					
					 Hong Kuk Hyon bagged bronze medals in the men's 66kg judo, Kim Su Gyong and An Kum Ae in the women's 63kg and 52kg judo, Jong Chun Mi in the women's 58kg weightlifting, Ri Hyang Sim and Jo Yong Suk in the women's individual 10m running target event and the 10m air pistol contest.

articles.title: New Book on Revolutionary History of Kim Il Sung Published
articles.content:
New Book on Revolutionary History of Kim Il Sung Published
						
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- "Collection of Materials on the Revolutionary History of Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" Vol. 12 was brought out. It was compiled by the Party History Institute of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The book deals with materials on the revolutionary activities conducted by President Kim Il Sung from November Juche 27 (1938) to October Juche 28 (1939).
					
					The book in its part 1 deals with what the President said when looking back on the period when he put forward strategic and tactical policies for ushering in a fresh surge in the Korean revolution by overcoming the prevailed difficulties and led the Arduous March of the main force of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, the operation for advancing into the Musan area and the military and political activities in the northeastern area of Mt. Paektu.
					
					Its part 2 carries reminiscences of anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters telling about the greatness of the President which they experienced in their struggle.
					
					This part of the book tells about facts that the President conducted the operation for advancing into the Musan area to make the enemy forces shudder after leading the Arduous March to shining victory and built new revolutionary bases in the northeastern area of Mt. Paektu and the northern part of Korea along Tuman River, bringing about a steady surge in the overall Korean revolution.
					
					It also deals with data on the superb commanding art of the President and his personality as a great man and the spirit of devotedly defending the leader displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, etc. 
					
					The book in its part 3 deals with domestic and foreign publications on the battles commanded by the President, the activities conducted by the KPRA and confidential documents of the army, police, secret agencies of the Japanese imperialists and the puppet Manchukuo.
					
					The appendix of the book carries the enemy's documents on the Japanese imperialists' moves to escalate war, etc. and publications on the Korean people's struggle against Japan and war in those days.

articles.title: Mural Paintings in Mausoleum of King Kogukwon
articles.content:
Mural Paintings in Mausoleum of King Kogukwon
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The mausoleum of Kogukwon, a king of Koguryo (B.C. 277-A.D. 668), is in Anak County, South Hwanghae Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The mausoleum, which is known as Anak Tomb No. 3, is one of the nation's world-famous heritages.
					
					 It, built in the middle of the 4th century, represents the culture of the East in those years and shows the advanced culture of the Korean people in the middle ages.
					
					 The mausoleum is about 33 meters long and 30 meters wide and six meters high. The chamber consists of a door, front room, passage, etc.
					
					 Each of most walls in several rooms was built with a large and plain rock and each of the doors weighs more than 500 kilograms but opens with ease.
					
					 Mural paintings on the walls of the mausoleum give a lifelike portrayal of figures, showing high techniques of painting at that time.
					
					 The mausoleum provides a glimpse of the history, customs, military affairs, architecture, painting, music, dance and other aspects of Koguryo. 
					
					 The UN Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization registered 63 mural tombs of Koguryo, including the mausoleum, as heritages of the world in July Juche 93 (2004).

articles.title: KCNA Accuses Japanese Imperialists of Attempt to Exterminate Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Accuses Japanese Imperialists of Attempt to Exterminate Korea
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency Tuesday issued a statement entitled "Japan's military occupation and rule over Korea are unpardonable hideous state-sponsored crimes" condemning the Japanese imperialists for their criminal attempt to exterminate the Korean nation 105 years since the fabrication of the "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty."
					 The statement says:
					
					 The biggest crime committed by the Japanese imperialists during their military occupation of Korea is that they cruelly killed Koreans.
					
					 Enforcing a brutal military rule, "cultural rule" and the fascist terror rule, they perpetrated such thrice-cursed crimes against humanity as massacring Koreans.
					
					 "Koreans should obey the Japanese laws, otherwise they should face deaths" and "It would be satisfactory if Koreans were exterminated as the Ainus in Hokkaido were done." This was the basic mode whereby the Japanese imperialists enforced a colonial man-killing rule over the Koreans.
					
					 On this basis they massively suppressed and killed patriots and other Koreans for having the spirit of national independence and anti-Japanese consciousness.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists conducted "punitive" operations by mobilizing huge aggression forces in a bid to put down the anti-Japanese volunteers struggle of the Korean people for winning the independence of the country.
					
					When there was the March First Popular Uprising in 1919, they brutally massacred at least 100,000 Koreans nationwide.
					
					 In 1920 they committed the massacre of Koreans in Jiandao by mobilizing their forces stationed in Korea, police force in North and South Hamgyong provinces, the garrison of Manchuria Railways, etc. 
					
					 They arrested and put in custody workers, peasants and students at random, mercilessly cracking down on the anti-Japanese struggle of the Korean people including the June Tenth Independence Movement in 1926, the general strike of Wonsan harbor workers and the Kwangju student incident.
					
					 Entering the 1930s, they ran with blood-shot eyes to "suppress" Koreans, blustering that if 100 Koreans were killed, there would be at least a communist among them. They shouted "Kill Koreans at random" and cried out for implementing the "three-point policy": Kill everybody, set fire on everything and loot everything.
					
					 They, at the same time, set up all kinds of repressive machines and cooked up and promulgated evil laws, trampling down upon even the slightest expression of the elementary human rights and freedom of Koreans, arresting and throwing innocent people behind bars and torturing and killing them under absurd pretexts.
					
					 In order to carry out their policy of massacring Koreans the Japanese imperialists posted most notorious fascists in Japan as the "governors general of Korea" who directly enforced their colonial rule on the spot. 
					
					Their massacre of Koreans had become all the more undisguised since 1938. In this period they kidnapped and took away more than 8.4 million Koreans, drove over 417,000 of them as cannon fodder for war and hurled at least 7,784,800 into slave labor sites and reduced 200,000 Korean women to comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army, taking the lives of many people. At least 700,000 of those who had been kidnapped and walked away and more than 143,000 of those comfort women were killed.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists killed more than one million Koreans in total during their military occupation of Korea. This means that one for every 20 of the population of Korea at that time was killed by them.
					
					 Their unprecedented suppression and massacre were perpetrated, pursuant to the Japanese authorities' ambition for aggression and policy for exterminating the Korean nation, a policy aimed to sacrifice a nation and a country for their domination over Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 What merits a serious attention in their criminal attempt to exterminate the Korean nation was that they pursued the policy of assimilating the Koreans as Japanese in the most crafty and persistent method in a bid to enlarge the "Yamato nation."
					
					 The Japanese imperialists set it as the ultimate aim of their rule over Korea to "assimilate Koreans as Japanese" and regarded it as a way for attaining it to eliminate the history of Korea and its cultural tradition and national character.
					
					 From the very day of their occupation of Korea they set in motion all the ruling machines, adopting it as their state policy to fully enslave the Koreans and eliminate their national character. 
					
					 In order to deprive the Koreans of their national character and soul, they undisguisedly enforced the policy for "making Koreans Japanese subjects", part of their brutal fascist moves in the field of ideology and culture.
					
					 What they sought here among other things was to eliminate from the minds of Koreans the national spirit by infusing into them the ideas that "Japan and Korea are one community" and "the Japanese and the Korean are of the same ancestry."
					
					They worked hard to implant into the minds of the Koreans the samurai spirit in a bid to "Japanize" in decades the Korean nation with a history spanning 5,000 years.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the Japanese imperialists did not allow the Koreans to use their mother tongue but forced them to use Japanese language in a bid to exterminate the Korean nation.
					
					 Under the slogan "Put the conception of Japan and Korea being one into practice, beginning with the use of Japanese" they forced all the Koreans to use Japanese language not only in government offices, companies, schools, factories but also at families, churches and even in public bath houses. 
					
					 Under the pretext of "changing Koreans' names into Japanese," they committed such unpardonable crime as depriving the Koreans of their own names from 1940. 
					
					 The Japanese imperialists' unpardonable criminal attempt to exterminate the Korean nation found an expression in that they savagely plundered Korea of its material resources to stifle it. 
					
					 They proclaimed the "Land Survey Act" under the pretext of "survey of right to land ownership," illegally expropriating more than one million hectares of land under the pretence of "violation of procedure", "uncertain evidence", etc. 
					
					 Meanwhile, they took away 39 million tons of rice under the signboard of "increased rice production plan", "grain delivery," etc. 
					
					They took away and slaughtered at least 1,943,000 heads of cattle which Korean peasants regarded as their flesh.
					
					 On May 1, 1918, they promulgated the "Forest Survey Act," expropriating 13 million hectares out of 16 million hectares of forest of Korea under the name of "state forest" and handing over the rest to Japanese landowners and pro-Japanese stooges. 
					
					 They fabricated such colonial predatory acts as "Korea Mining Act" and "Fishery Act," plundering Korea of its rich underground and aquatic resources in the harshest manner. 
					
					 The material resources looted by the Japanese imperialists in Korea reached astronomical figures at their face value. 
					
					 The mental, human and material damage the Korean people suffered due to the colonial rule by Japan is the biggest one in human history in the light of the form it was done and its contents and scope. 
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan has persistently sought to stage a comeback to Korea since its defeat, far from liquidating its past crimes.
					
					 It is the invariable Korea policy of Japan to reduce the Koreans to its slaves and make Korea part of its territory. 
					
					 Over the last 65 years since its defeat Japan has persistently resorted to political and military threats and blackmails and economic sanctions against the DPRK, regarding the latter as a thorn in the flesh. It has also persisted in the harsh national discrimination and suppression of Koreans in Japan and their descendants who live there due to the aftermath of the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 These actions of Japan are obviously an extension of the moves of Imperial Japan to exterminate the Korean nation. 
					
					 All the facts go to prove that Japan is the sworn enemy of the Korean nation as it committed crimes never to be condoned down through the generations to come. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are fully determined to force Japan to pay for all its crimes. 
					
					 Japan should behave itself, properly understanding their will, and make honest apology and reparation to the Korean nation for its past crimes.

articles.title: US Invariable Scenario for Invading DPRK Assailed
articles.content:
US Invariable Scenario for Invading DPRK Assailed
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the U.S. Defense Department declared recently that U.S.-south Korea joint military maneuvers would be staged in the West Sea of Korea with the super-large nuclear carrier George Washington involved. Later the U.S. secretary of Defense and the chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff announced that the U.S. would conduct joint military exercises with the south Korean puppet forces in the West Sea of Korea at any cost. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: Such outbursts let loose by the American warmongers are a grave challenge to the Korean people and the international community desirous of peace as they revealed the U.S. invariable hostile policy towards the DPRK and its wild ambition for invading it.
					
					 It is the unchangeable scenario of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK by force of arms, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists seek to ignite an all-out war with a surprise preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK as a prelude, while staging large-scale war exercises with aggression armed forces involved. It is prompted by this aim that the U.S. is contemplating bringing George Washington to the projected saber-rattling. 
					
					 Lurking behind it is also a sinister aim to militarily pressurize and contain other powers in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 Such reckless moves of the U.S. for a war of aggression cannot be construed otherwise than anachronistic actions as they will disturb the peace and stability of not only the Korean Peninsula but also Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and spark off a new Cold War. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to drop its daydream to realize its scenario for aggression on the DPRK by force of arms.

articles.title: US Application of Double-Standard to Human Rights Blasted
articles.content:
US Application of Double-Standard to Human Rights Blasted
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. styling itself "an international human rights judge" suffered bitter disgrace as it was questioned in the dock at a recent international meeting on human rights. In a word the U.S. was attacked at the meeting not only by different countries but by its allies.
					 Commenting on this fact, a news analyst of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says:
					
					 The UN Human Rights Council strongly accused the U.S. of its poorest human rights record in the world for the first time in history. This was an entirely just action in the light of the nature of the international body specializing in human rights issues and from the viewpoint of impartiality.
					
					 Noting that it is the inveterate bad habit of the U.S. to abuse human rights, the commentary cites facts to prove the human rights abuses of the U.S. styling itself "an international human rights judge" as it pleases. 
					
					 The U.S. has considered it as its job and as a lever for interfering in the internal affairs of other countries to pull up them over what it called "human rights issues" every year, while shelving the hideous human rights abuses committed by it so far, it says, and continues:
					
					 The recent meeting of the UN Human Rights Council goes to clearly prove once again that the double-standard applied by the U.S. to the human rights issue does not work any longer.
					
					 The reality proves that the U.S. criminal acts of encroaching upon the state sovereignty of other countries under the pretext of the "human rights issue" are bound to be judged by history.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to take the shame and hard time it experienced in the international arena as a good chance to look back on its human rights abuses and encroachment upon the state sovereignty of other countries and draw a lesson from them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Stronger Driving Force of Songun Revolution
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Stronger Driving Force of Songun Revolution
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- A strong driving force of revolution with the People's Army as its main force has been built in the DPRK under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and this serves as a powerful engine for the on-going advance for a great surge. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The leadership of the WPK serves as a basic source of the strength that enabled all the servicepersons and people to form the most solid and purest ideological entity on the basis of the revolutionary Songun idea of the leader. It also provides a basic guarantee for turning the revolutionary ranks into strong elite forces with the People's Army as a pillar and a main force of the revolution and helping all the members of society unite with genuine comradeship based on love and trust.
					
					 The revolutionary ranks of Songun in the DPRK are proud of being invincible ranks fully equipped with the Juche idea, the Songun idea of the WPK.
					
					 Cherishing the firm faith that Songun is the only way of building an invincible power, the army and people of the DPRK are remaining true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The power of Songun Korea, the might of the single-minded unity has reached its highest level in the course of the struggle being waged by them regarding the idea and line of the WPK as a lifeline.
					
					 Grand monumental structures symbolic of the era of the Workers' Party are springing up one after another and fresh innovations and leap forward are reported from all the fields of the national economy. This reality goes to clearly prove that only when the revolutionary ranks are turned into powerful elite forces with the People's Army as a main force, miracles are wrought in building a thriving nation.
					
					 The revolutionary army instills inexhaustible revolutionary spirit into all members of the society and all the people work hard, following its example. In this course the revolutionary ranks are growing stronger as the days go by and a victory in the drive to build a thriving nation is coming earlier than expected. 
					
					 The noble ideological and moral world in which everyone thinks more of the collective than him or her and works for comrades can be brought into bloom in the DPRK only where all the people are giving full play to collectivism on the basis of genuine comradeship.

articles.title: Scheme for Conclusion of FTA Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Scheme for Conclusion of FTA Blasted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Civic and social organizations grouping people of different circles in south Korea held a candlelight rally in Seoul on Nov. 10 assailing the authorities' moves to conclude the humiliating FTA with the U.S.
					 At the rally the vice-chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the permanent co-representative of the Solidarity for Progress and other speakers condemned the authorities for leaving no means untried to strike deals at the negotiations for the conclusion of the FTA with the U.S.
					
					 They charged that the authorities are working hard to leave the life and health of the people and the economic sovereignty and all other crucial matters to the tender mercy of their American master by opening the auto market and importing beef infected with mad cow disease, etc.
					
					 If the deals are struck at the negotiations, they will not only lead to deteriorating the people's livelihood but hand only poverty to posterity, they deplored.
					
					 They called upon the people of various circles to boost the solidarity and unity for foiling the moves to conclude the humiliating FTA without fail.

articles.title: Stop to Suppression of Trade Unions Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Suppression of Trade Unions Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Members of international labor movement organizations and trade union organizations in south Korea jointly called a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 11, denouncing the puppet group for suppression of trade unions.
					 Speakers at the conference accused the present "government" of south Korea of indiscriminately suppressing the internationally recognized activities of trade unions and desperately preventing part-time workers from joining trade unions and concluding a collective contract, in collusion with enterprise owners.
					
					 They urged the "government" to stop at once its infringement upon the rights of the workers and the right to labor movement.
					
					 The trade unions all over the world positively support the south Korean labor movement organizations in their struggle for an end to violence and suppression, they noted.
					
					 They demanded that the "government" remove the legal obstacles lying in the way of ensuring the basic right to labor, release the detained union activists and stop the discrimination against the part-time workers.
					
					 Meanwhile, members of international labor movement organizations in different countries held rallies and conducted information service denouncing the south Korean "government" for its crackdown upon trade unions.

articles.title: NDC Inspection Group's Statement on "Cheonan" Case Supported
articles.content:
NDC Inspection Group's Statement on "Cheonan" Case Supported
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, released a statement on Nov. 10 in support of the first installment of a statement released by the inspection group of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 He in his statement accused the U.S. and the south Korean authorities of getting evermore frantic with their racket to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK as evidenced by the war maneuvers staged by them one after another, far-fetchedly linking the "Cheonan" warship case which occurred in the West Sea of Korea with the DPRK.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The DPRK advanced a proposal for dispatching an inspection group of the NDC for a field survey and other most reasonable and fair and aboveboard proposals for clearing suspicions and distrust of the domestic and international public in the "Cheonan" case and defusing the tension prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities, however, unilaterally announced what they called the "results of investigation" and the "finial report" released by the "civilian-army joint investigation team" in a bid to deter the above-said inspection group from conducting a field survey.
					
					 The world progressives who love peace are dismissing the above-said case as a conspiratorial farce and charade orchestrated by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities.
					
					 They should immediately stop their racket for confrontation with the DPRK being kicked up under the pretext of the warship case.
					
					 We support the first installment of a statement released by the NDC of the DPRK and its efforts for laying bare the nature of the fabrication and charade.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- On April 25, Juche 65 (1976), President Kim Il Sung visited an army unit to congratulate its servicepersons on the anniversary of the Korean People's Army and have a picture taken with them.
					 All servicepersons had a picture taken with the President but only a soldier on sentry missed the chance.
					
					 The President went to the sentry and personally took a picture of him.
					
					 The President then adjusted his military uniform and cap and had a picture taken with him, arm in arm with him.

articles.title: ATCC publica cronica de crimenes de Japon contra la nacion coreana
articles.content:
ATCC publica cronica de crimenes de Japon contra la nacion coreana
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo de que se cumplen 105 anos de la invencion del "Tratado de 5 Puntos de Ulsa", la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea (ATCC) publico el 16 de noviembre la cronica de los crimenes cometidos por los imperialistas japoneses contra la nacion coreana.
					  Esta cronica se titula "La ocupacion militar y la dominacion de Japon sobre Corea constituyen un gran crimen imperdonable organizado por el Estado".
					
					  Abajo va el texto resumido de ella:
					
					  El crimen mas grande cometido por los imperialistas japoneses durante la ocupacion militar de Corea fue la matanza cruel de innumerables coreanos. 
					
					  Ellos cometieron este crimen de lesa humanidad nunca perdonable practicando la brutal dominacion militar, la "cultural" y la fascista y terrorista.
					
					  El modo principal del colonialismo japones se fundamentaba en estas teorias: "Los coreanos estan en la disyuntiva de obedecer a las leyes japonesas o morir" y "Es preferible que los coreanos fueran exterminados al igual que la minoria Ainus de Hokkaido".
					
					  En virtud de estas doctrinas, fueron reprimidos y asesinados en masas los patriotas y los habitantes coreanos que tenian el espiritu de independencia nacional y la conciencia antijaponesa.
					
					  Para sofocar la lucha de los voluntarios antijaponeses coreanos levantados por la independencia del pais, los imperialistas japoneses lanzaron las "operaciones punitivas" movilizando a un gran numero de tropas agresoras.
					
					  Por ejemplo, durante el Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo desatado en 1919, resultaron asesinados salvajemente a lo largo de pais mas de 100 mil coreanos.
					
					  En 1920, las tropas japonesas ocupantes de Corea, los policias de las provincias de Hamgyong del Sur y del Norte, la guarnicion de los ferrocarriles de Manchuria y otras fuerzas ejecutaron la gran operacion genocida contra los coreanos en Jiandao.
					
					  Los imperialistas japoneses arrestaron y encarcelaron indiscriminadamente a los obreros, campesinos y estudiantes reprimiendo la lucha antijaponesa del pueblo coreano, inclusive el Movimiento Independentista del 10 de Junio de 1926, la huelga general de los obreros portuarios de Wonsan, el incidente estudiantil de Kwangju, etc.
					
					  La caza de coreanos se torno mas feroz en la decada de 1930 segun la orden asesina de "Maten a cualesquier coreanos porque debe haber un comunista al menos entre 100 coreanos" y la "politica de los 3 exterminios - matar a todos, quemarlo todo y saquearlo todo".
					
					  Los aparatos represivos y las leyes infames de toda calana inventados por los imperialistas japoneses acabaron con el mas elemental derecho humano y libertad del pueblo coreano y permitieron el arresto, encarcelamiento, tortura y asesinato de los coreanos inocentes.
					
					  Eran fascistas mas connotados de Japon los sucesivos "gobernadores generales de Corea" que estuvieron a cargo de ejecutar en el terreno la politica genocida de coreanos y practicar directamente la dominacion colonial.
					
					  El genocidio entro en la etapa crucial despues de 1938.
					
					  En aquel entonces, mas de 8 millones 400 mil coreanos fueron secuestrados y arrestados por la fuerza, de ellos mas de 417 mil y mas de 7 millones 784 mil 800 fueron lanzados a los escenarios de guerra y a los campos de duros trabajos, respectivamente, y 200 mil coreanas fueron convertidas en esclavas sexuales del ejercito japones.
					
					  Entre los coreanos reclutados forzadamente para el combate y los trabajos de esclavitud y las consoladoras sexuales perdieron la vida mas de 700 mil y mas de 143 mil, respectivamente.
					
					  Durante la ocupacion militar de Corea, los imperialistas japoneses mataron a mas de un millon de coreanos en total, es decir, a uno por cada 20 de la poblacion coreana de aquel tiempo.
					
					  Tal represion y genocidio sin precedentes partieron de la politica de exterminar a la nacion coreana y la ambicion agresiva de las autoridades japonesas que pretendian sacrificar a una nacion y un pais enteros para tomar la hegemonia en Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					  Lo grave del crimen para exterminar a la nacion coreana fue la politica de japonizacion que los imperialistas japoneses practicaron de manera mas astuta y obstinada para transformar a los coreanos en la "nacion de Yamato".
					
					  Para este fin, fijaron como meta final de la dominacion de Corea "japonizar a la nacion coreana" y presentaron el remedio de eliminar la historia, las tradiciones culturales y la nacionalidad del pueblo coreano.
					
					  Desde el principio de la ocupacion de Corea, establecieron como politica estatal esclavizar al pueblo coreano y eliminar su nacionalidad y movilizaron generalmente los aparatos de gobernacion para ejecutarla.
					
					  Como parte de medidas fascistas en la rama ideologica y cultural, implementaron abiertamente la politica de "hacer del pueblo coreano fieles ciudadanos del imperio japones" con la meta de privar a los coreanos de su nacionalidad y espiritu.
					
					  En ese sentido, inculcaron en el pueblo coreano las falsas doctrinas de "Japon y Corea son una misma nacion" y "descienden de un mismo tronco y una misma casta".
					
					Los imperialistas japoneses trataron de inyectar tambien el "espiritu de Samurais" con el objetivo de "japonizar" en unos decenios a la nacion coreana que tiene una historia de cinco milenios.
					
					En particular, ellos obligaron a los coreanos a hablar en japones para eliminar para siempre a la nacion coreana del mapa mundial.
					
					Bajo la consigna de "para hacer de Japon y Corea una misma nacion, hay que usar primero el mismo idioma materno", impusieron a hablar en japones en todos los lugares como oficinas gubernamentales, companias, escuelas, fabricas y hasta en los hogares, iglesias y banos.
					
					A partir de 1940, cometieron otro crimen imperdonable de forzar a los coreanos a cambiar sus apellidos y nombres al estilo japones.
					
					Ademas, saquearon enormes recursos materiales de Corea para asfixiar economicamente al pueblo coreano.
					
					Promulgaron la "ley de investigacion de la tierra" bajo el rotulo de "confirmar las propiedades de la tierra" y se apoderaron ilegalmente de mas de un millon de hectareas con el pretexto de  "irregularidades en la tramitacion" y "pruebas intransparentes", etc.
					
					Por otra parte, llevaron a Japon 39 millones de toneladas de arroz con el pretexto del "plan de aumento de la produccion de arroz" y "entrega obligatoria de granos".
					
					Y mataron mas de un millon 943 mil vacas que criaban los campesinos coreanos con mucho afecto.
					
					Tras promulgar el primero de mayo de 1918 la "ley de investigacion forestal", arrebataron 13 millones de 16 millones de hectareas del area forestal de Corea bajo el rotulo de "propiedades del Estado" y distribuyeron lo restante a los terratenientes japoneses y lacayos projaponeses.
					
					Ademas, fabricaron la "ley de mineria de Corea", la "ley de piscicultura" y otras leyes de explotacion colonial para saquear con metodos mas brutales las abundantes riquezas subterraneas y marinas de Corea.
					
					Los recursos materiales arrebatados por los imperialistas japoneses en Corea llegan a una suma astronomica.
					
					Las perdidas espirituales, humanas y materiales sufridas por el pueblo coreano debido al coloniaje japones no tienen antecedentes en la historia de la humanidad tanto en sus formas y contenido como en su dimension.
					
					Sin embargo, en lugar de liquidar sus crimenes del pasado, Japon viene persiguiendo constantemente desde su derrota en la Segunda Guerra Mundial la ambicion de ocupar otra vez a Corea.
					
					La politica de Japon sobre Corea esta orientada a convertir a la nacion coreana y a Corea en su esclava y en una parte del territorio japones.
					
					Durante 65 anos despues de su derrota, considerando a Corea como una espina atravesada en la garganta, Japon amenazo y chantajeo militarmente y sanciono economicamente a la primera. 
					
					Para colmo, continuaron discriminando y reprimiendo a los coreanos y sus descendientes que viven en Japon como consecuencia del coloniaje japones.
					
					Estos actos son evidentemente la continuacion de las maniobras del viejo imperio japones para exterminar a la nacion coreana.
					
					Todos los hechos muestran claramente que Japon es el enemigo jurado que cometio crimenes nunca perdonables contra la nacion coreana.
					
					Ahora el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea estan dispuestos a ajustar la cuenta de los crimenes de Japon.
					
					Japon debe actuar con prudencia conociendo bien al ejercito y al pueblo de Corea, pedir disculpas e indemnizar sinceramente a la nacion coreana por sus crimenes del pasado.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena la pauta de doble rasero de EE.UU. en DDHH
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena la pauta de doble rasero de EE.UU. en DDHH
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos, autoproclamado como "juez internacional de derechos humanos", paso tremenda pena siendo llevado al banquillo de acusado en una conferencia internacional sobre los DDHH.
					En esta reunion, EE.UU. fue criticado duro por otros paises, incluso hasta por sus aliados.
					
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico en su edicion de este martes un comentario individual.
					
					Por primera vez en la historia, el Consejo de los Derechos Humanos de la ONU censuro fuertemente en esa conferencia la situacion de derechos humanos de EE.UU. que tiene peores antecedentes del mundo en esta materia, senala el comentario y prosigue:
					
					  Esto fue mil veces justo tanto por el caracter de esa organizacion internacional especializada en los problemas de DDHH como en el principio de imparcialidad.
					
					Hay muchos datos reveladores de los crimenes de EE.UU. que actua descaradamente como "juez internacional de DDHH" aunque esta enviciado en violarlos.
					
					Hasta ahora, el imperio se dedicaba a cuestionar el supuesto "problema de DDHH" de otros paises ocultando sus enormes crimenes y usaba este tema como medio de intervencion en los asuntos internos de otros paises.
					
					La reciente reunion del Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU volvio a comprobar claramente que hoy dia, no vale mas la pauta de doble rasero de EE.UU. en el problema de derechos humanos.
					
					Es decir, se ha confirmado en realidad que seran sentenciados sin falta por la historia los actos criminales de EE.UU. que viola la soberania estatal de otras naciones acusandolas del "problema de DDHH".
					
					EE.UU. debe sacar la leccion de la verguenza sufrida esta vez en la arena internacional aprovechandola como oportunidad de reflexionar seriamente de todos sus crimenes contra los DDHH y la soberania estatal de otros paises.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica la ambicion agresiva de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica la ambicion agresiva de EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el portavoz del Departamento de Defensa de Estados Unidos anuncio que desplegaria en el Mar Oeste de Corea un entrenamiento militar conjunto con el Sur de Corea con la participacion del portaaviones de propulsion nuclear supergrande "George Washington".
					Lo confirmaron tambien el secretario de Defensa y el presidente de la Junta de los Jefes de Estado Mayor de EE.UU.
					
					En su comentario individual fechado 16, el rotativo Minju Joson califica tales dichos agresivos de los belicistas estadounidenses de una manifestacion de invariable politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC y de su ambicion de agredir y atropellar a esta con las fuerzas armadas.
					
					Igualmente, significan un grave desafio al pueblo coreano y la sociedad internacional aspirantes a la paz, senala el comentarista y continua:
					
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos intentan provocar la guerra total al atacar sorpresiva y preventivamente a la RPDC con armas nucleares mientras desarrollan los ejercicios de guerra movilizando colosales fuerzas agresoras.
					
					En este contexto, van a movilizar el portaaviones nuclear "George Washington".
					
					Por otra parte, detras del plan de librar el entrenamiento conjunto en el Mar Oeste, esta otro intento de presionar y detener militarmente a otras potencias en la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Estos movimientos aventureros y anacronicos de EE.UU. perturban la paz y la estabilidad no solo de la Peninsula Coreana sino tambien del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo y buscan la nueva guerra fria.
					
					EE.UU. debe abandonar su vana ambicion de agredir a la RPDC con las fuerzas armadas.

articles.title: Personalidad bengali apoya el acta de revelacion del CDN de la RPDC
articles.content:
Personalidad bengali apoya el acta de revelacion del CDN de la RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El presidente de la Liga Popular de Bangladesh, Garib Newaz, hizo publica el dia 10 una declaracion en apoyo a la primera parte del acta de revelacion del grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El documento destaca que despues de ocurrido el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" en el Mar Oeste de Corea, Estados Unidos y las autoridades surcoreanas desplegaron sucesivos ejercicios belicos vinculandolo absurdamente con la RPDC y endurecen abiertamente la campana de enfrentamiento con ella.
					
					Apunta que la RPDC presento la propuesta de investigacion en el terreno del grupo de inspeccion del CDN y las otras mas racionales y justas que permitiran disipar las dudas y la desconfianza de los nacionales y extranjeros en cuanto al caso de "Cheonan" y superar la tensa coyuntura creada en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Pero, EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas publicaron el llamado "resultado de investigacion" y el "informe final" del "grupo de investigacion conjunta de civiles y militares", organizado unilateralmente, impidiendo hasta el final la investigacion en el terreno del grupo de inspeccion del CDN de la RPDC, senala.
					
					Prosigue que la humanidad progresista del mundo amante de la paz considera el incidente de "Cheonan" como complot e invento de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Exige a ellos que cesen ahora mismo su campana de confrontacion anti-RPDC que lanzan pretextando el incidente.
					
					Expresa el apoyo a la primera parte de susodicha acta y a los esfuerzos de la RPDC por desenmascarar el complot.
